description.p: Saves component data to the application repository.

argument.name: key
argument.description: A key for saved data entered into the repository. The key value must be unique.

discussion.p: The *[js:{dialog.object}.saveDataInRepository()]* method saves the data that the user has entered in the component to the application repository using the specified 'key' value. (The [Repository Settings] are configured in Web Project Properties).
The [afterSaveToRepository] client-side event fires after the event has completed.
